The 2014 International Conference on Progress in Informatics and Computing (PIC-2014) will be held on May 16-18, 2014 in Shanghai, which is famed as a thriving metropolis and one of the largest city in the world. The combination of the traditions and modernism and the East mixing with the West has built its unique charm.. PIC-2014 will provide a forum for researchers and practitioners in academia and industry to discuss the progress, challenges, experiences and trends of the theoretical and application issues in information science, computer science, software engineering, and information management, to exchange ideas, share knowledge and promote future cooperation.
